group_1.textLeft: For now, Mr. Miranda has been detained@by the management staff.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see...@That's a relief...
(Neither Mr. MacQueen, nor I...@have shadows of death anymore...)

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much...Rui...
I've just finished explaining Ending E to him.
He probably wouldn't have believed me if@I did that earlier...

group_1.textRight: Here...@at "God's" booth...
I'm so glad a shooting didn't happen...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much for your continued support.
...Now, security still has questions for me,@so please excuse me.

group_1.textRight: Case closed!
Oh, right.
You were too reckless back there!
You could have been shot...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, don't worry, I took all the necessary@precautions...
It's hard to aim with an imitation gun, so he@had to get close and target the center of the body.
So...@I hid a blunt weapon under my clothes.
Plus, I put my magic power in it so it could@protect me from the bullet.

group_1.textRight: Blunt weapon...
But Kamiket has a baggage check...

group_1.textLeft: No, there's one blunt weapon that anyone can@bring in.

group_1.textRight: Anyone can bring it in...?@[chara:303901:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:303901:motion_000][chara:303901:cheek_0][chara:303901:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303901:lipSynch_1]No way...!

group_1.textLeft: There is!
Hecatoncheires' Revelation!

group_1.textRight: ...The catalog?!
I guess if it's that thick, it would work as one.

group_1.textLeft: Also, I normally wear chainmail underneath@my uniform.
There were no flaws!

group_1.textRight: ...I'm just gonna pretend I didn't hear that.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for today, Rui!
I'm so glad nobody got hurt!
If it wasn't for you...
It would have caused an uproar way bigger@than Kamiket!

group_1.textRight: No...it was nothing.
I'll be taking my leave now, then...

group_1.textLeft: Let's go, Seira.

group_1.textRight: Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: Wait!
Before that...@Can you tell me one thing?
Your unflappable spirit and calm judgment in@that situation...
Just who...or what the heck are you?

group_1.textRight: Oh, nothing really...@Miss, I'm just a severe case of chuunibyou.
But, if I had to say...
I'm just your humble Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Magical...Girl...[chara:800102:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:800102:cheek_0][chara:800102:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:800102:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*@I'll remember that.

group_1.narration: "Behind the peace of Kamiket stands a Magical Girl."
Such a myth will be passed down.
